author: nicko
msg: NETCF Compact Framework does not support volatile keyword

author: nicko
msg: Added GlobalContext similar to MDC but not thread local.
GlobalContext.Properties is a shared properties dictionary that can be included in the
output by using the %global pattern in the PatternLayout.

author: nicko
msg: Added ReadOnlyPropertiesDictionary that is a read only mapping from String to Object.
Changed the PropertiesDictionary to extend the ReadOnlyPropertiesDictionary.
Added copy constructors to both to allows the dictionary to be initialised from another
